title: Add 'Sea Foods' as a product category

requirements.text: Add 'Sea Foods' as a valid product category option in the backend category list so that sellers can assign it to product listings.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend accepts 'Sea Foods' as a valid category value when creating or updating a product listing.
Existing products and categories remain unaffected.

requirements.text: Add 'Sea Foods' to the category filter list on the ProductsPage sidebar and to the category dropdown in the ProductForm used by the Seller Dashboard, so sellers can select it when listing products and buyers can filter by it.
acceptanceCriteria: 'Sea Foods' appears as a selectable option in the category dropdown inside ProductForm (Seller Dashboard).
'Sea Foods' appears as a filter option in the category sidebar on ProductsPage.
Filtering by 'Sea Foods' correctly shows only products assigned that category.
The category badge on product cards displays 'Sea Foods' when that category is assigned.

constraints: Do not remove or rename any existing product categories.
Do not modify any files listed under frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding any other new product categories beyond 'Sea Foods'.
Changing the visual theme or layout of category filters.
Modifying the payment or order flow.
